_comment: This file is generated. Please edit .homeycompose/app.json instead.

description.en: Turn your Homey into a surveillance system
description.nl: Verander uw Homey in een bewakingssysteem
description.de: Verwandeln Sie Ihren Homey in ein Überwachungssystem
description.fr: Transformez votre Homey en système de surveillance
description.it: Trasforma il tuo Homey in un sistema di sorveglianza
description.no: Gjør din Homey til et overvåkningssystem
description.sv: Förvandla din Homey till ett övervakningssystem
description.da: Forvandl din Homey til et overvågningssystem
description.es: Convierte tu Homey en un sistema de vigilancia

hint.en: This card is triggered when the Alarm State is activated. The Zone and Reason are available in the tags.
This card is triggered when the Alarm State is deactivated. The way the Alarm State is deactivated is available in the Source tag.

title.es: El retardo de la alarma está activado.

hint.en: This card is triggered when the Alarm Delay is activated. The length of the delay, Zone and Reason are available in the tags.

title.it: Il ritardo di inserimento è attivato.
title.es: El retardo de armado está activado.

hint.en: This card is triggered when the Arming Delay is activated. The length of the delay is available in the Duration tag.

title.it: Nota nella TimeLine è stata scritta
title.no: En linje ble skrevet i loggen
title.da: En linie blevet skrevet i loggen
title.es: Una línea de registro ha sido escrita

hint.en: This card is triggered when a line is written to the log for a device that has logging enabled. The Zone, Device and State are available in the tags.

This card is triggered when a device has not communicated with Homey for 24 Hours. All devices are checked when changing the Surveillance Mode or using the Check Last Communication Flow card. The Duration, Last communicationtime, Zone and Device are available in the tags.
This card is triggered when there is a sensor in active state when the Surveillance Mode is set to Armed or Partially Armed.

title.fr: Capteur actif lors de la vérification de l'état.
title.it: Sensore attivo durante il controllo dello stato.
title.es: Sensor activo en la comprobación de estado.

hint.en: This card is triggered when there is a sensor in active state when a Sensor Check is run.

title.es: Sensor disparado en estado de alarma

hint.en: This card is triggered when a sensor is tripped while the Alarm State is active. The Zone, Device and State are available in the tags.
This card is triggered when the Surveillance Mode is changed, the new Mode is available in the Surveillance Mode tag.
hint.nl: Deze kaart wordt geactiveerd als de Toezicht Modus gewijzigd wordt, de nieuwe mode is beschikbaar in de Toezicht modus tag.

title.fr: Le temps jusqu'à ce que l'alarme a changé
title.it: Il tempo prima dell'allarme è cambiato
title.es: El tiempo hasta que la alarma cambió

hint.en: This card is triggered when the Alarm Counter changes. The seconds left are available in the Seconds until alarm tag.

title.it: Il tempo prima dell'inserimento è cambiato
title.es: El tiempo hasta que cambió el armado

hint.en: This card is triggered when the Arming Counter changes. The seconds left are available in the Seconds until armed tag.

title.es: El estado de alarma es !{{activo |no activo}}

hint.en: Evaluates if the Alarm State is (not) active.
Evaluates if an Alarm Countdown is (not) active.
Evaluates if an Arming Countdown is (not) active.
Evaluates if the chosen device has the delayed setting.

title.de: Gerät ist !{{Teil|nicht Teil}} des Vollständigen Überwachungsmodus
title.fr: L'appareil !{{fait|ne fait pas}} partie du Mode de Surveillance Complète
title.it: Il dispositivo !{{fa parte|non fa parte}} della Modalità di Sorveglianza Completa

title.sv: Enhet är !{{del|inte del}} av Fullt Övervakningsläge
title.da: Enhed er !{{del|ikke del}} af Fuld Overvågning tilstand
title.es: El dispositivo !{{hace parte|no hace pare}} del modo de vigilancia completa

title.nl: Controleer de status van alle sensoren
title.fr: Vérifier l'état de tous les capteurs
title.it: Verifica lo stato di tutti i sensori
title.es: Verificar el estado de todos los sensores

hint.en: Checks the status of all Motion- and Door/Windows sensors. Make a flow with the triggercard Sensor active at Status Check to process the results.
Checks if devices that are included in a Surveillance Mode have communcicated with Homey in the last 24 hours. Make a flow with the triggercard No information received to process the results.
